c74object.name: fl.timemean~
c74object.digest: Outputs the mean per sample over a given number of frames.
c74object.description: Frames are expected to be of uniform size, otherwise the buffer is reset. The number of frames (as well as the maximum number of frames) can be set as parameters. The output is the same size as the input.

entry.name: 0. /max_frames [int]
entry.description: Sets the maximum number of frames that can be set as a time period - changing resets the buffer.

entry.name: 1. /num_frames [int]
entry.description: Sets the current integer number of frames for calculation.
